sections.text: MIT Sloan’s MBAn equips students with rigorous analytics, optimization, and machine learning skills to solve high‑impact business problems through a 12‑month, STEM‑designated curriculum.
Students complete a one‑year program combining core coursework in machine learning, optimization, and data science with an industry Analytics Capstone/Practicum.

items: Up to 66 units per term (max 54 from Sloan)
sections.text: The MBAn is an intensive, full‑time program with a prescribed unit load and hands‑on capstone requirements.
Graduates pursue roles in data science, analytics, and operations research across technology, consulting, and finance.
